youtube.title: GCP Interview Q1005: Architecting Scalable Multi-Agent AI on Google Cloud #Shorts
youtube.description: This video details how to architect a scalable and secure multi-agent system on Google Cloud. Leveraging Vertex AI Agent Builder and ADK, agents are developed and orchestrated through the Vertex AI Agent Engine, with Managed Sessions providing stateful execution. Secure Code Execution and Agentic IAM govern operations, while the Agent-to-Agent Protocol facilitates inter-agent communication. BigQuery Continuous Queries and Vertex AI Search with Vector Search enable real-time data integration, powered by Gemini 1.5 Pro and Vertex AI Reasoning Engine for advanced intelligence. Frameworks like LangChain and CrewAI, alongside Firebase Genkit, streamline development. Master scalable AI on GCP!
